```{r}
#| results: hide
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
#| message: false
library(RefManageR)
library(bibtex)
file <- "publications.bib"
bib <- ReadBib(file, check = FALSE)
BibOptions(
  check.entries = FALSE, style = "markdown", cite.style = "authoryear",
  bib.style = "numeric"
)
AutoCite(bib, author = "massicotte")
```

```{r}
#| results: asis
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
#| message: false
PrintBibliography(
  bib, 
  .opts = list(
    check.entries = FALSE, 
    sorting = "ydnt", 
    max.names = 999, 
    no.print.fields = c("url")
  )
)
```
